name: Make Beautiful Advanced Gradients 2021
description:
🗞 UPDATE: I've started a design bundle subscription where we send you at least 1 new premium design system every month + other assets. If you'd like to support us please consider joining here!


Hi friends,


Welcome to the file, if you’d really like to get the most out of it then I really do suggest you watch the tutorial and learn to make gradients on your own.


Follow me for updates and I’ll see you again soon! - Izzy
